description: ## Overview Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Buffer Overflow via the processing of DNS Servers options in DHCPv6 Advertise messages. An attacker can cause a buffer overflow and potentially execute arbitrary code or disrupt service by sending a crafted DHCPv6 Advertise message. ## Remediation There is no fixed version for `tianocore/edk2`. ## References - [Additional Information](https://blog.quarkslab.com/pixiefail-nine-vulnerabilities-in-tianocores-edk-ii-ipv6-network-stack.html) - [RedHat Bugzilla Bug](https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2258697)
remediation: There is no fixed version for tianocore/edk2 .
title: Buffer Overflow

vulnDescription.Overview: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Buffer Overflow via the processing of DNS Servers options in DHCPv6 Advertise messages. An attacker can cause a buffer overflow and potentially execute arbitrary code or disrupt service by sending a crafted DHCPv6 Advertise message.
